title: Handle a Subpoena for a Reporter's Notes
description: The news organization has received a subpoena from a court demanding a reporter's notes for a story. This must be handled by the legal department.

tasks.description: The recipient of the subpoena immediately forwards it to the in-house legal counsel without taking any other action.
tasks.expected_outcome: The subpoena is immediately in the hands of the legal experts.

tasks.description: The legal department reviews the subpoena to understand its scope and validity.
tasks.expected_outcome: The legal team understands the demand.

tasks.description: The legal team prepares a motion to quash the subpoena, citing reporter's shield laws and First Amendment protections.
tasks.expected_outcome: A legal challenge to the subpoena is drafted.
